name: Dive Dive Dive
description: This is the first game I made, which was done in the Unity engine. This was for the Introduction to Games Programming module. You are a diver that goes through the sea. There are several different enemies that have different characteristics, such as pufferfish, which is changing its' size, or octopus, which only goes in a vertical direction. The pixel-art textures are done by me and took about a week. The whole code was developed in under 24 hours.
